summary: Three skydivers and their travelling thrill show barnstorm through a small midwestern town one Fourth of July weekend.
cast: Burt Lancaster|Deborah Kerr|Gene Hackman|Scott Wilson|William Windom|Bonnie Bedelia|Sheree North|Carl Reindel|Ford Rainey|John Napier|Wendell Burton|Thom Conroy|Patty Plenty|Bill Zuckert
keywords: fourth of july|kansas|skydiving|based on novel|redheaded woman
title: Los temerarios del aire
